description: This file defines a React functional component named TodoList that renders a list of tasks by mapping each task to a TodoItem component. It manages the presentation of a list of to-do items with props for toggling completion, deleting, and saving tasks.

methods.name: TodoList({ tasks, onToggleComplete, onDelete, onSave })
methods.description: React functional component that renders a list of TodoItem components based on the tasks array and callback props.

ctags.name: TodoList
ctags.pattern: /^export default function TodoList({ tasks, onToggleComplete, onDelete, onSave }) {$/
